domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@realDonaldTrump Then stop falsely accusing people of politicizing #COVID19. And stop making false claims stating how great you’re handling it. Stop claiming the virus is no big deal.

Start actually doing great things and provide adequate testing, provide a plan for lost wages, and help people.
